de.tudarmstadt.ukp.wikipedia.revisionmachine.difftool.consumer
Class AbstractConsumer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.tudarmstadt.ukp.wikipedia.revisionmachine.difftool.consumer.AbstractConsumer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConsumerInterface, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArticleConsumer, DiffConsumer, SQLConsumer
public abstract class AbstractConsumer
extends Thread
implements ConsumerInterface

The AbstractConsumer class is the super class of all DiffTool Consumers.

sleep

public void sleep()
           throws TimeoutException
This method will let the current thread sleep if the sleeping mode has been activated. The consumer state will be changed accordingly during the sleep period.

Throws:
TimeoutException - If the sleep counter values have reached the configured timeout value.
